message: Apple Salaries Sucks! I would say Microsoft Pay well comparing to what I see!
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: 16 Highest Paid Jobs by Apple | RevoSeek.com
caption: revoseek.com
description: Apple is said to please employees with salaries they deserve

data.message: احنا في مصر كده مبنقبضش حاجه :(

because basically in Egypt we don't make anything! we use others tools and technologies even the work we do in Egypt is not used globally! Give me a sample company/project that people use on a daily bases worldwide! the Answer is NONE :)

because basically in Egypt we don't make anything! we use others tools and technologies even the work we do in Egypt is not used globally! Give me a sample company/project that people use on a daily bases worldwide! the Answer is NONE :)
if there is good invest in egypt software market it will be a huge biz for us , there is many talents there, but with no funds :)

The problem is not in investments. this is a management HUGE Issue! if you look at the history of the IT Giants ex  (Microsoft & Apple) they both started with 1 person. off course comes the investments next to scale the company but without good management every thing will break apart.
yes i agree with you , entrepreneurship is a young baby here in egypt , its hard to quit your job and start a business may success and may fail .

I'll tell you something that only people living outside Egypt will relate to. Don't be fooled by the numbers. The cost of living is quite different. Seriously, it sounds a big number a year, count taxes, count rent, count the cost of even things like vegetables, count health insurance costs, you'll find it's not that different from what a decent company in Egypt would pay. I bet most people will read this as bla bla bla, but it's true.
